custom.title: Advanced note
custom.subtitle: Document: {{title}}
custom.themeHint: This CSS is applied only to this note (not the rest of the app).
custom.themeScopeHint: Tip: use simple classes. (t)ext will automatically scope your CSS to the note.
custom.pluginsHint: Extensions are small JavaScript scripts that can transform Markdown or register markdown-it rules. Treat them as trusted code.
custom.pluginsEmpty: No extensions yet. Add one to get started.
custom.pluginsSelect: Select an extension on the left.
custom.pluginFooterHint: Note: the script must end with `return { ... }`.
custom.presetsHint: Pick a theme, then choose whether to replace or append to your CSS.

personalize.title: Customize (t)ext
personalize.subtitle: Global theme & CSS
personalize.hint: Click a theme to apply it instantly. Global CSS is saved automatically when you close this window.
personalize.presetsHint: Click a theme to replace your global CSS. Use "Append" to add the snippet to your current CSS.
personalize.cssHint: This CSS is applied to all of (t)ext (UI + preview).
personalize.cssScopeHint: Note: (t)ext automatically scopes this CSS inside the app surface (.app-root).
personalize.fontHint: Choose the global UI font and (optionally) the monospace font. If a font isn't installed, a fallback will be used.
personalize.fontScopeHint: Note: fonts are applied to the whole app (.app-root). You can still override them via Global CSS.
personalize.blocksHint: Optional block-based editing. When enabled, (t)ext splits your note into independent blocks (paragraphs).
personalize.blocksHint2: Default is off. Toggle anytime: your content stays the same, only the editing mode changes.

publish.title: Publish
publish.subtitle: Share “{{title}}” as a public page
publish.desc: Create a public page you can share. You’ll also get a secret edit code to update or delete it later.
publish.customLinkDesc: Pick the slug (the part after the domain) to get a link like {{origin}}/my-page. Leave it empty to generate a short random link.
publish.customLinkInvalid: Invalid link: use only letters, numbers, - and _ (2–64 chars) and avoid reserved words.
publish.note: Note: locally this works on Netlify only (use “netlify dev”).
publish.editCodeHint: Keep it safe: open the public link, click “Edit” and paste the code to edit/delete.

public.enterEditCodeDesc: To edit or delete this page, enter the secret code generated when you published it.
public.invalidEditCode: Invalid code. Please check and try again.
public.editPageHint: Enter the secret code to enable editing and save changes.
